## matcherToString() function

Converts a matcher or data into a human friendly string for printing

**Signature:**

```typescript
matcherToString: <T>(actual: T, indent?: number) => string
```

</th><th>

a printable string

This is currently the same implementation as [actualToString()](./case-plugin-base.actualtostring.md)
